alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Butler (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 4:33PM EDT until August 26 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pittsburgh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Butler County in west central Pennsylvania... West central Armstrong County in west central Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 433 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Meadowood, or 8 miles east of Butler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines, resulting in some power outages. * Locations impacted include... Kittanning, Ford City, West Kittanning, Worthington, West Hills, Manorville, Ford Cliff, Applewold, and Lenape Heights. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 412-262-1988, posting to the NWS Pittsburgh Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSPITTSBURGH.
